page.title: 03SADBERGE VILLAGE CHURCH
page.content: The{Sadberge}parish church is about {150}years old.It is the third church to stand on this site.The first church built by the{Saxons}was pulled down in {1266}and replaced by a{Norman church which stood to 1832.This church was given away to the builder of the present church and many interesting things were lost.One of the church {stained glass windows}was smashed by some vandals.The church usually has a {Rector}but the congregation is now so small that when the last one left in {1984}he was not replaced.Mr Bell the {churchwarden}now looks after the church.He{publishes}the{church {magazine}once a month.After he has written it my mam types it out and he duplicates and disributes it.I go to church every Christmas for the choir practice. By Roger Parry(Aged 9)
